description: Try our easy to follow Beef chow mein with broccoli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef dishes,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Beef
name: Beef chow mein with broccoli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 32g Maggi beef chow mein recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add mince and stir-fry, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 3 minutes or until browned.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions, discarding flavour sachets. Drain. Roughly cut with scissors.
Add vegetables to mince, then stir fry for 8 minutes or until just tender.
Combine 1 cup water and recipe base in a small jug. Add sauce mixture to mince mixture and bring to the boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Add noodles and toss to combine. Divide among bowls and serve.
